Handaxe.description: A handaxe is a small axe that can be used with one hand. It is often used by woodsmen and hunters.

Greataxe.description: A great axe is a large, heavy axe that is designed for use with two hands. It is often used by warriors and barbarians.

Shortsword.description: A shortsword is a small sword that is designed for use with one hand. It is often used by rogues and assassins.

Shortbow.description: A shortbow is a light weapon made with flexible wood and a string, designed for quick shots.
